explore our
awesome Features

Photon is a simple and easy to use discord moderation bot, packed full of features, with no paywall included!

A Fast Music System

It includes a simple and easy to use music system, based on lavalink and erela.js frameworks, for incredible speeds!

Including A Role Select Menu!

Want to add autoroles to your server? No problem! Photons autorole system is the easiest to use and setup out there!

With a simple and effective timout system!

Includes a convenient timeout system for all those misbehaving members

An Easy Ban And Logging System!

An effective ban command, including logging and unbanning!

A USERful User report system

Setup a channel for user reports, and allow members to report misbehaving members

An Effective User Ticket Sytem

Includes an easy to setup user ticket system, to allow your members to contact staff
